    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94783</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Toughness of metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Härte der Metalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dureté des métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toughness dos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durezza dei metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθεκτικότητα των μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dureza de metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that steel sheet is so tough that it can be stamped into a car bonnet without breaking.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">breaking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car bonnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal sheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">toughness</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Stahlblech so haltbar
ist, daß es in eine Automütze gestempelt werden kann, ohne zu 
brechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la tôle d'acier 
est si dure qu'elle puisse être emboutie dans un capot de voiture 
sans rupture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a folha de aço é 
assim resistente que pode ser carimbada em um bonnet do carro sem 
quebrar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la lamiera di 
acciaio è così dura che può essere timbrata in un cofano 
dell'automobile senza rompersi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φύλλο χάλυβα είναι
τόσο σκληρό που μπορεί να σφραγιστεί σε ένα καπό αυτοκινήτων 
χωρίς σπάσιμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la hoja de acero es
tan resistente que puede ser estampada en un capo del coche sin 
romperse.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Automütze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
